data.what_is: RD Station Marketing is a software application that helps your company carry out better campaigns, nurture Leads, generate qualified business opportunities and achieve more results. From social media to email, Landing Pages, Pop-ups, even Automations and Analytics.
data.product_description: RD Station Marketing is a marketing automation platform simply designed to help businesses grow. The software allows you to attract visitors to your website, turn them into leads and nurture them into customers, all in one place.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 140 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 132 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 125 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 138 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 136 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 133 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 104 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 98 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 127 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 110 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 207 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 194 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 206 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 194 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 208 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 193 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 180 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 188 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 187 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 206 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 198 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 208 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 191 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 195 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 189 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 180 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 164 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 170 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: As reported in 149 RD Station Marketing reviews. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 150 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: As reported in 139 RD Station Marketing reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores. This feature was mentioned in 74 RD Station Marketing reviews.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 159 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 156 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Based on 146 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 143 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 188 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 178 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 153 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 146 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Based on 167 RD Station Marketing reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
User-friendly interface: RD Station Marketing is known for its intuitive and user-friendly interface. It offers a smooth and straightforward experience, making it accessible to users with varying levels of technical expertise. The platform is designed to simplify marketing processes and workflows, allowing users to focus on their marketing goals rather than getting lost in complex software.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Customization limitations: I have occasionally expressed a desire for more customization options within RD Station Marketing. While the platform offers various templates and design options, I may have specific requirements that may not be fully accommodated within the available customization capabilities.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform facilitates effective email marketing campaigns by providing templates, automation workflows, and segmentation options. This enables businesses to nurture leads, send targeted messages, and build customer relationships, leading to higher engagement and conversion rates.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
I've been using RD Station for my business for several months now, and I have to say that I'm really impressed with the platform. It's an all-in-one marketing automation tool that makes it easy to manage your email campaigns, social media presence, and website analytics all in one place.

One of the things I really like about RD Station is how user-friendly it is. Even if you've never used marketing automation software before, you can quickly get up to speed with the intuitive interface and helpful tutorials. The drag-and-drop email editor is especially handy for creating professional-looking emails without needing to know a lot of HTML.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Pricing: Some users may find RD Station's pricing to be on the higher side compared to other marketing automation tools in the market. The cost could be a barrier for small businesses or startups on a tight budget.

Complexity: While RD Station is generally user-friendly, some users may find the platform to be overwhelming due to its many features and options. It may take some time to learn how to use all the tools effectively.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
market issues

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
I've been using RD Station for my business for several months now, and I have to say that I'm really impressed with the platform. It's an all-in-one marketing automation tool that makes it easy to manage your email campaigns, social media presence, and website analytics all in one place.

One of the things I really like about RD Station is how user-friendly it is. Even if you've never used marketing automation software before, you can quickly get up to speed with the intuitive interface and helpful tutorials. The drag-and-drop email editor is especially handy for creating professional-looking emails without needing to know a lot of HTML.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Pricing: Some users may find RD Station's pricing to be on the higher side compared to other marketing automation tools in the market. The cost could be a barrier for small businesses or startups on a tight budget.

Complexity: While RD Station is generally user-friendly, some users may find the platform to be overwhelming due to its many features and options. It may take some time to learn how to use all the tools effectively.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
market issues

Pricing: Some users may find RD Station's pricing to be on the higher side compared to other marketing automation tools in the market. The cost could be a barrier for small businesses or startups on a tight budget.

Complexity: While RD Station is generally user-friendly, some users may find the platform to be overwhelming due to its many features and options. It may take some time to learn how to use all the tools effectively.

all_reviews.review_title: Ferramenta maravilhosa para o time de marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
O Rd e muito completo, acredito que e uma das melhores ferramentas de mercado quando falamos sobre automacao de marketing, principalmente na criacao de fluxos inteligentes.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Ainda ha algumas ferramentas que fazem diferenca no dia a dia do marketing que a meu ver sao simples e ainda nao existem. Por exemplo, poder deletar empresas sem ter que fazer uma a uma.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automacao de marketing, envio de email marketing em massa, lead scoring

all_reviews.review_content:

1deg - Opcao para criacao de um site/hospedagem, com opcoes para personalizar arrasta e solta e automacao tudo integrado. (Seria Perfeito).

2deg Um APP para facilitar em edicoes rapidas com o smartphone, imagina ter a opcao de criar um e-mail personalizado para um cliente com o celular na mao rapidamente. (Seria Perfeito).

Atende diversas necessidades de pequenas empresas que nao possuem um setor de marketing estruturado.

Organizacao dos fluxos de entrada de novos clientes, opcoes para personalizar automacao de e-mails.

all_reviews.review_title: Ferramenta muito estrategica para conquista de novos clientes
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Somos clientes do RD ha mais de 3 anos e gosto muito da ferramenta. Ela ja no trouxe diversos clientes e hoje temos uma estrategia de inbound bem fundamentada por causa da ferramenta, que da muito autonomia e liberdade. Gosto muito das segmentacoes e do historico dos leads que e muito completo. Aqui, utilizamos a estrategia de ABM e a ferramenta e essencial na conquista de novos clientes.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Nao gosto de ter que ficar colocando tag em tudo para fazer automacoes. Isso e bem desgastante, gostaria de um processo mais automatico. Alem disso, nao e possivel apagar tags que nao utilizamos mais. Entao, as vezes da muita confusao ao escolher qual e a tag correta.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Atualmente, temos mais de 14k leads na base e grande parte deles sao muito qualificados, essa foi uma grande conquista em 3 anos. Com isso, conseguimos tracar estrategias para melhorar nosso branding, conquistar nossos clientes e sermos mais referencia no mercado.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Sempre achei a ferramenta bastante intuitiva, alem disso, sempre trazendo novidades e principalmente, usando aquilo que ela vende: inbound marketing, mostrando valor e fazendo realmente a diferenca no mercado da publicidade no Brasil.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Sempre admirei muito a RD e por isso defendi como a melhor ferramenta sem sombra de duvidas, mas agora com conhecimentos mais avancados e trabalhando em startup - mobile, vejo alguns pontos que ainda sao bastante engessados e poderiam expandir muito mais, se adaptando as realidades e modelos de negocio. Mais um ponto e que dependemos muito de qual CS nos atende, ja tive CSs incriveis que conseguiam sempre me ajudar e orientar, como tive CS que nao consegue me responder nem duvidas basicas, sinto que nao e uniforme, ou pode ser que o nivel desse profissional varie muito de uma conta pra outra, e isso causa um desconforto no profissional que assiste a conta.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
RD e uma plataforma extremamente intuitiva e que ajuda a organizar a comunicacao da empresa, ela otimiza o tempo dos profissionais com a automacao, tornando mais escalavel os processos de comunicacao. Recomendo muito. Vale a pena.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tanto como agencia, como cliente, Rd pra mim e a melhor ferramenta de disparo de e-mail marketing, assim como landing pages. Com a atualizacao tambem ficou muito melhor a criacao de automacoes, ela resolve a questao de relacionamento com cliente, e principalmente captacao de leads.
- Otimizacao do processo de SDR, Vendas e Nutricao - automacao
- Captacao e atualizacao de leads - LP
- Envio de informacoes de forma geral ou segmentada - Email

all_reviews.review_title: E uma boa plataforma. Tem boa parte das ferramentas necessarias para trabalho com marketing digital.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Eu gosto do suporte tecnico da plataforma. Resolve-se as coisas rapidamente e raramente temos problemas recorrentes repetidos.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Acho que o custo e um pouco elevado para alguns projetos/clientes e com certeza nao tem todas as ferramentas que uma builderall por exemplo.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
Eu ja trabalho com a RD Station desde quando estava na outra agencia de marketing a qual era socio. Entramos em um momento que a parceria com a RD, ou seja, possuir uma conta para o uso da agencia era apenas uma questao de levar um cliente, no caso o primeiro e naturalmente teriamos todo um caminho de sucesso a percorrer.

Eu fundei outra agencia e levei um cliente (a MZM que esta no print) com a expectativa de ter a mesma parceria. Infelizmente as politicas da empresa mudaram e isso nao foi possivel.

Isso me permitiu ir atras de outras solucoes para mim e foi ai que encontrei outras plataformas mais completas com precos mais acessiveis que sao uma otima opcao para quem nao consegue pagar pelos valores cobrados pela RD.

Agradeco imensamente por me fazerem sair da zona de conforto pois hoje alem de ter mais opcoes para meus clientes, os dois projetos que eu toco em particular tambem consigo utilizar uma excelente plataforma de marketing que e acessivel ao meu bolso!

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automacao de e-mail marketing e liberdade de criacao na apresentacao dos produtos com LPs sem precisar de um desenvolvedor.

A facilidade de enxergar o percurso do lead no funil de vendas, ou ate mesmo no e-mail marketing. Vale tambem deixar aqui meu agradecimento ao suporte que atende via chat ou via e-mail que sao sempre otimos, rapidos e alguns tem muita vontade para explicar.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Acho o fluxo de automacao um pouco confuso de montar. Algumas vezes tive que entrar em contato com o suporte para entender exatamente como funcionavam as condicoes de entrada, porque pela explicacao, nao fica tao claro. Talvez pra quem ja tivesse experiencia com a montagem, mas como eu nao tinha, achei confuso.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
Minha recomendacao seria tornar mais facil os indicativos do fluxo de automacao.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
O maior problema que estou resolvendo hoje com a RD sao os envios de e-mail marketing com segmentacoes mais expressivas. E os beneficios foram que minhas taxas de abertura e click aumentaram bastante.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Excellent tool, extremely complete. What I like most is that it has explanatory tutorials in all its steps and the fact that it is very intuitive.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
For multinational companies, the language issue is a bit tricky. I am in a company that operates in latin america, europe and asia. In other words, we would need a tool with multiple languages. However, if I choose Portuguese as the language in RD, all forms and other files will be translated to Portuguese and cannot be used in other countries. And, if in other countries, they select another language, the forms will come with the selected language. Ideally, the language could be customizable.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am starting to use the tool now, as I am from a fintech starting operations in Brazil. My biggest problem currently is having 1 single platform for all countries.

What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
RD Station is helpful to manage the marketing leads through its many resources. It's easy to create landing pages e send e-mails to our lists, besides checking their performance.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
The layout has been changing lately but in a languid way. So, one day we find information in one place, the other a lot has changed, but some bugs are not fixed fast - anyway, it's still easy to navigate through the site. Another point is the landing pages layout for mobile that's not possible to edit in the platform, harming our strategies to reach out to the mobile leads.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
The company has nurturing leads with e-mails, monitoring contacts, and providing rich content to downloads, helping us get more qualified leads.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Promover aos nossos clientes na agencia o relacionamento com seus leads e clientes, a captacao de leads e a execucao de uma estrategia consistente de inbound marketing (considerando as funcionalidades disponiveis no RD Station).

all_reviews.review_title: Good marketing automation tool for inbound campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
RD Station has many integrations with other apps, specially Brazilian apps that usually are not so easily integrated with other automation tools as many of them don`t have an open api. I use, for example, "ingaia" software that is niche app for real estate business that does not have an open api.
Creating automation flows is also easy with lots of features. User history with all tracked information including pages visited and conversions made are also very useful.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
The main problem for me today is that the client can only be identified by email address. Nowadays, i talk to my customers via messaging apps and usually all I have is their mobile number. But without email information I cannot identify such user in the system.
Also many features could be more refined and have more possibilites, the landing page creation for example should be more flexible and have more models to choose from (if i want to do things from scratch i can build my own landing page, but that`s what paying RD for). There is no mobile app to check how things are on the go. The price tier increase hugely with the number of contacts you have, but as I grow my base I believe it is getting too expansive as I am not seeing the return I get from the platform with the same rate as price increases.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
I do recommend RD Station specially for inbound marketing and emails campaigns. If creating campaigns to drive customers through you funnel using email and segmentation based on user behavior is what you are looking for than it is good. Also you may consider that if your users base is growing fast the price increase of the solution may become a problem.
If you pretend to use just "some" of the functionalities, you may find less expansive tools to do the job. For a "hands on"  and more flexible approach you could look for "mautic". Compared to other great automation software such as activecampaing and hubspot I believe the main RD strengthen is to be charged in Brazilian Reais - as I write this 1 USD = 5,65 BRL but this tools sure offer better functionalities and more refined development.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Used to create campaigns for specific products. RD Station allow us to capture lead from landing pages, integrations with my facebook leads ads, my website and my crm (witch is integrated with many real estate advertise platforms).
It allows me then to engage the users through the funnel using marketing automation flows, sending emails, tracking users on the site, tracking conversions from integrates software creating segmentation.
Also, we use it to integrate various software, including crm software, messaging, facebook ads, google analytics, and others.

all_reviews.review_title: The best platform to boost your brand and sales effectively.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
RD Station is a unique and powerful solution to increase sales, through an incredible marketing system born to understand the needs of customers, the tool is perfect for capturing contacts, integrate it into social networks, implement campaigns through emails, get quick analysis to know each situation, in general is a very well structured platform. The service allows users to work in a personalized way, allows to visualize and identify opportunities to ensure success. The interface of this platform stands out for its great innovation and its ease of use that allows users to work quickly. The experience that can be obtained when working with RD Station is sensational and the best thing is that it is perfect to use in medium and small companies to increase their success in the market.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
I consider that the price of the service becomes inaccessible as more clients are obtained, since it increases considerably, I would like the platform to provide more accessibility so that it is an attractive option for marketing specialists. As far as operation is concerned I can say that RD Station is very good and I have no complaints to make, since it always does what I want and when I want.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
If you are looking for a reliable software to improve your sales and boost the brand of your company or business, I can recommend you to evaluate RD Station as a great option, since it is a marketing system quite comfortable to work with because of the wide resources it provides, it is a practical, modern and easy to use system.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
RD Station is a super special tool for our marketing and sales team, since it is very useful for us to extend our campaigns through many social networks, we can contact high potential customers for our business, keep our image at a good level and above all keep our sales at high levels, missing that our objectives are completed successfully and effectively, we are really happy to work with RD Station for its excellent performance.

all_reviews.review_title: Automation and delivery of advertising is easy with this tool.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
RD station has many functions and tools that make it a complete software in what includes a digital marketing strategy that is based or focused on emails, it is easy to learn to use, you do not necessarily have to have knowledge of web design to do it. Help in the search for customers based on a specific product and carry out a marketing strategy related to the data offered by users and thus have the best possible results.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
There are other software that help you in more specific solutions and they work a little better, it is also limited when it comes to customizing and due to this, it will be a little difficult to have something that characterizes you in the design and you can highlight it differently without there is another company or consumer that already has similar characteristics.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
It is more accessible to obtain compared to other software that helps the entrepreneur with little knowledge of both digital marketing and creating designs more easily. Have a better reach with users and you can also schedule publications on social networks, this will help a lot in saving time, you can focus on other areas of marketing that require it. That would be the reason for recommending or choosing RD Station.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problem solved: as a small company, it helped us to have a better reach with users due to our design, thanks to the easy handling of its tools and functions, which make the job less complicated, since we do not have great knowledge of it.
In addition, the extensive system and tools make the software focus on providing solutions and we have noticed good references on our website.

all_reviews.review_title: Great inbound marketing and sales platform for different and various types of business and companys
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Bring together multiple tools for inbound marketing and sales in one platform. Besides that, they provide a free CRM (RD CRM) for customers and RD Station Marketing has multiple possibilities for integrations with other tools.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
The reports. I think there should be more options and filters.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
With RD Station, we Building a solid and efficient marketing and sales strategy.

We evolved and increased all of our numbers: blog visitors and visits, site visitors and visits, keywords ranked on the first page of Google, e-mail marketing open rate, social media followers and engagement, leads, opportunities, sales and revenue.

I have no doubt, RD Station transformed and still transforming (and help us to build) our history.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best tools in marketing automation in Brazil
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
The cost-benefit ratio and the features that let me automate processes in marketing and sales.RD Station allow the team to make fast and reliable marketing strategies and "get the job done" quickly and with no errors.

Also we really like the RD Station Marketing and RD Station CRM Integration, because that allow us to sell more.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
The lack of some possibilities of grouping and sorting leads.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
Test the tool and make sure to ask all the questions you have see if RD Station fits your needs and if it will improve your marketing strategies.

Also is fundamental to know that RD Station is just a marketing tool, so you still need someone to operate it (like a marketing analyst) and to plan the strategies your business needs to grow (a marketing consultant or a planner).

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main problem was the low engagment of our leads and now we can automate the comunnication with them.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
RD Station has brutally increased it's features and UX through the years. In spite of being a company outside america, it does not lose to any other marketing automation tools like Hubspot, Pardot, Marketo, etc. First class e-mail marketing, flexibility to create my own landing pages in minutes and a lot of integrations are the strengths. Of course, RD Station has also a very capable and helpfull customer success and support team.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
I've been using RD Station for 5 years. As the brazilian market is not as mature as the american, most of the RD customer's are yet struggling with basics pains. This means that the dev's team focus naturally is to solve this kind of customer's problems. And this also means that sometimes more advanced customers have to wait more to "gain" some features. However, RD's software can be used for iniciants in inbound marketing and also for advanced ones.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Without RD Station we couldn't growth our income cash because we scaled our company through inbound marketing. RD Station and also our CSs had a significant job to do so.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
I love the creation part of landing pages. I like how broad the platform is, and it has several ways of editing.
I also like the editing area for emails. It has a variety of options to add to the email, it's very useful! I also like the organization of leads, and the area of   postings in social networks, this saves a lot of time, with the RD I can post to facebook, twitter and linkedin all at once.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
I did not like the fact that they removed the option to shorten the URL. It would be nice if you had an option to insert a video in the edition of landing pages and also in the email, it is difficult to insert the HTML, sometimes it does not work as expected. Also, I think I love everything on the platform, it meets all my expectations!.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
It is a complete platform. In those 3 years that I have been in the company using RD, I have never had problems, nor disturbances with frequent emails. They are very attentive and always ready to help you in whatever you need. I recommend 100% to RD.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Small questions about creating landing pages were quickly solved. In the beginning, we had a successful consultant, helping us and teaching us to learn the platform. He made video calls with me and my boss, and he explained many things to us. They are very attentive!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Easy to use and intuitive. Defining and understanding strategies was the biggest challenge. The DR encouraged us to improve routines. Our sales operation is more efficient. We are communicating better with our potential customers. We are communicating better with our active customers.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Visually, improvements could be made to the performance analysis of e-mail in automation. But it's just an over concern. In practice, the system does not prevent me from having access to the really important information.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
Deploying RD is easy. But it is critical that the company has a good alignment of marketing strategies. RD has a specialized team to help with this.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
For sure. We improve the communication routine with our customers and automate the sending of emails. The RD gives us the freedom to create our own "sales machine", reducing the cycle of negotiations and closings of new business.

all_reviews.review_title: Sem exageiros, a RD esta mudando minha vida
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
O que eu mais gosto e o fato de nao ser apenas uma plataforma, a RD me ajuda a resolver minhas maiores dores na empresa e marketing com apoio publico (materiais digitais) e com apoio exclusivo (Customer Success) de modo a me ajudar a crescer, aprender, e ter resultados que cursos tradicionais como graduacao, pos, nao possibilitam. O tema Marketing Digital e ainda recente no mercado, entao a Resultados Digitais esta transformando esse mercado aqui no Brasil para muita gente.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Acredito que o CS poderia ser personalizado para cada tipo de nivel de conhecimento da pessoa. Caso o cliente tenha pouco conhecimento, pode haver um pacote mais proximo, em que o CS possa acompanhar mais de perto esse cliente, e da mesma forma para clientes seniores que possuem grande conhecimento em marketing digital.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
E recomendado que o futuro cliente esteja certo de quais serao as formas de estruturar o Inbound em sua empresa, saber que e necessario ter nocoes de SEO, que tera de fazer um blog, ter conteudos, ter quem fara os conteudos... algo que nao ficou tao claro comigo. Sabia que era necessario, mas nao que era fundamental. Hoje eu sei, e agradeco os conteudos e apoio da equipe.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
A RD Station esta me ajudando a estruturar o processo de vendas geral da empresa, de forma mais eficiente e sustentavel. O modelo na minha empresa e de telemarketing, em que se compram listas segmentadas e a equipe de Cold Call fica o dia inteiro ligando para 100 leads por dia. A RD ira mudar esse cenario.

all_reviews.review_title: RD Station - A Rocket for sucess
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Among the many options for marketing automation, we chose RD Station for bringing together several solutions on the same platform.
We work on attracting leads, qualifying and converting using pop-ups, ads, social media publications, landing pages and email marketing without leaving the RD Station. With a background in design and marketing, I use the RD and the platform helped me to get out of a situation of professional stagnation in view of the financial crisis that was affecting my clients, and I was able to return growth thanks to this tool.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
What I do not like much about RD Station is that it is not accessible for smaller customers, they end up preferring more punctual solutions because of the risk of the value invested considering the limited budgets. Even presenting the results, they are reluctant to use the tool.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
All in one.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
For my clients, we have solved the problem of reaching the right target, and we have been able to track our audience beyond content nutrition, qualifying the leads until the exact moment of the purchase day. We are increasing our efficiency and optimizing resources.

all_reviews.review_title: Does what you need, at a price you can (maybe) afford.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RD Station Marketing?
Their interface keeps being updated, with new features being added in a somewhat regular pace. The new features they add are usually nice additions to their ecosystem and work right away (with some tinkering, every now and then).
It has many tools you need, all in a single place: email template creation, email feed automation, landing page creation, tools to help with better segmentation, stats from Google Analytics... aside from, of course, bread and butter of all platforms such as this one (CTR, number of new leads, open rates per email, email bounces, etc.)
Their customer support is also very well trained and resourceful: as an example, when we needed to migrate some landing pages from their old to their new "landing page creation" editor, they helped us with it and it all was solved by them very quickly.
Since it is a very popular platform in Brazil, many clients already have at least heard of what RD does, even if they don't know what RD Station is about. This brand recognition is helpful to sell to the client why they should subscribe to this system.

What do you dislike about RD Station Marketing?
Their pricing scheme could be a little more competitive, seems that RD has decided to focus only on the bigger companies leaving no room for small fish.
Sometimes, the interface changes can be a little confusing: some features that you are used to have in one area disappear, hidden under some other menu; or they change places with no indication of where they are now; or are renamed/no longer exist.
Also a problem with their interface: it may require too much training for clients that aren't very tech savvy. Working in an industry with plenty of clients who barely understand why generating leads is important, showing them how to navigate RD Station and what is going on was such a bother that we have to create easier to follow graphs elsewhere, which could be resolved through focusing on a little more intuitive design in this department.

Recommendations to others considering RD Station Marketing:
Keep in mind that it may not have the pricing scheme you need right now, but if your business is headed in the right direction it may turn out affordable very quickly.
While they don't have a free version, their trial has enough time for you to figure out whether it is what you need or not (specially if you can look up their training videos)
It is a very big platform in Latin America, but I do not know whether or not support for other languages is there yet.

What problems is RD Station Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed a platform that could manage all our email marketing and funnel leads from landing pages to a database. It checks all those requirements and does it well.
Since we work with many different clients, we needed to offer them a service that works, is recognizable to them and has a good reputation in their eyes.
Having started to use RD Station, we no longer needed to worry about managing lead generation and were no longer using many different software to do all the functions that were required to keep producing credible results to our clients.
Since it has many features all gathered in one place, we were less worried about having to constantly keep track of what we were offering to clients, if it was going to be affordable to them while also being manageable by us.

review_question_answers.answer: Evaluate your real necessities in needing this product. It has great tools that will help your business but needs commitment in using the platform. There are other solutions in the market that can do what RD Station does for less $.
